description: Maximum cycle length (orbit size) in the rotation permutation of n+2 side polygon triangularizations.
comments: I.e., in permutations A057161 and A057162 (also A057503 and A057504), the longest cycle among all cycles between the (A014138(n-2)+1)-th and (A014138(n-1))-th terms.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 07 2000
